name: Breaking Loneliness
description:
A girl trapped in an empty land, with her unique powers, are you ready to turn the land into a beautiful land?

How to play:

  • A, S, W, D to move
  • 1, 2, 3 to spawn plants.
  • 4 remove plants.
  • 5 save games

Credit Model and Music:

  • A2 Game
  • ARTKOVSKI
  • VGComposer

(!) Models and Music from the Unity Asset Store.
